title: A Heart in winter = Un Coeur en hiver
creator_credit: Claude Sautet, Philippe Carcassonne, Jean-Louis Livi, FR3, Paravision International, D.A. Films, SEDIF, Orly Films, Cinea and Film Par Film
brief_description: Daniel Auteil and Emmanuelle Beart (the leading actors from Manon Des Sources) star in this triangular love story which explores the darker recesses of the heart and soul; where emotion is repressed. Two longtime friends in the classical music world find their friendship is threatened when a beautiful woman enters their lives. Ravel’s music forms a striking background to the drama as one woman embarks on a journey of surrender to passion.
